title: Fox Defends Bill O'Reilly's Account Of Falklands Conflict
teaser: Fox News star Bill O'Reilly's is accused of embellishing his war reporting experience during the Falklands conflict. And in typical O'Reilly fashion, he's not taking the accusations lying down.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
